reviewText: Great DVD one & only I have not seen any other one out there like this one ... This Preacher tells the truth in the entire video , I do really recommended it to everyone out there I give this video 5 stars.
This presentation is very graphic and will impress even the most critical. For some it may be very deep and cause some emotional tears; however, the benefit is well worth the risk.
I have these movie and it is a 5 star in my view,tho made in the 1970's but still a great movie of the  consequences of rejecting Christ.

All was fine with recieving the order, but it was not what the person wanted and so had to return it for a partial refund.
Think that there should be a better description of the product. whether it is in Spanish or English or both. This was not in the language that they needed.
Sending the order back and getting refund was good. Sorry it was not the one they wanted.
I would order again from this party. But only if a better description was given. Thank you!
